name: module-federation-example
description: Orchestration package for the Module Federation microfrontends (host, header, catalog, details, cart-orders).

scripts.start: echo "Use dev:* or build:* scripts to manage the Module Federation apps."
scripts.install:all: npm run install:host && npm run install:header && npm run install:catalog && npm run install:details && npm run install:cart-orders
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:host" "npm run dev:header" "npm run dev:catalog" "npm run dev:details" "npm run dev:cart-orders"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:host && npm run build:header && npm run build:catalog && npm run build:details && npm run build:cart-orders
